name: link-embed
title: Link Embed
oneLiner: Rich embedded link previews with OpenGraph metadata for EventContent
documentation:
# Link Embed

## Overview

A rich link embed component that fetches and displays OpenGraph metadata in card format. Auto-registers with ContentRenderer when imported, overriding simpler link handlers.

## Features

- Auto-registration with ContentRenderer (priority 5, overrides link-inline-basic)
- Fetches OpenGraph metadata (title, description, image)
- Rich card display with responsive layout
- Handles both single URLs and arrays of grouped URLs
- Loading states and fallback handling

props.name: url
props.description: URL(s) to display - single string or array of grouped URLs
